body.p: The PDU has a front-accessible Monitoring Compartment () with low-power monitoring components, including PCBs with customer network connections. The compartment is part of the left front PDU door. The compartmentâ€™s panel door allows access to PCBs without opening the PDU doors, so that PCBs and connections can be accessed without exposure to high-power bus bars. PDU Monitoring Components Part 1: Monitoring Compartment
